name: A Short Venture
description:
Title: A Short Venture

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

A 3D Lego platformer made with Unity. Defeat the enemies and collect the treasure to win!

Instructions:

Move your mouse around to look around. 

WASD to move (forward, left, back, and right respectively).

Spacebar to jump and there is a double jump.

Tab for options.

Game Design Team

Nathan Nguyen – Game Designer
